name: Snow Way Out (Jake Mills' Games)
description:
Collect the Presents, Find your way to the Tree, and Save Christmas in this Festive Maze Game! Game Info

Explore the festive maze and collect as many presents as you can. Interact with torches and doors to make your way to the giant Christmas tree. Enjoy the festive soundtrack as you give the locals a visit.

Version Info

The current version is 1.0. This is the only version of the game.

Controls

Keyboard & Mouse

  • Move - WASD / Arrow Keys
  • Look - Mouse
  • Jump - Space
  • Snowball - Left Click
  • Light Torch - Right Click
  • Quit to Menu - Escape
Installation

Installation couldn't be simpler, just extract the downloaded ZIP file and launch the executable within the extracted folder.

Project Info

The brief for this module was to focus on incorporating different game mechanics into a maze game. As a result, this festive-themed maze platformer was created by myself.

Enjoy Playing!
